[Memory 4+] 攻擊時: 恢復 2。

effect:
[Class Bonus] CARDNAME gets +1 [POWER].

[Memory 4+] **On Attack: Recover 2**. *(To **recover**, remove that many damage counters from your champion. Apply this effect only if there are four or more cards in your memory.)*
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Allied Warpriestess gets +1 POWER.

[Memory 4+] On Attack: Recover 2. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion. Apply this effect only if there are four or more cards in your memory.)
name: Allied Warpriestess

rule.description: When a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent. In the case of Force Load, it allows more than one Bullet cards to be loaded at once and fired at the same time.

editions.effect:
只要 CARDNAME 為備戰狀態，他便具有潛行。

[Level 1+] 當 CARDNAME 並未進行防禦時，他可以對攻擊者進行反擊。
editions.effect_raw:
只要 Lurking Assailant 為備戰狀態，他便具有潛行。

[Level 1+] 當 Lurking Assailant 並未進行防禦時，他可以對攻擊者進行反擊。
editions.flavor: 這座城市正需要你這樣的審問官。
editions.effect_html: 只要 Lurking Assailant 為備戰狀態，他便具有潛行。Level 1+ 當 Lurking Assailant 並未進行防禦時，他可以對攻擊者進行反擊。

editions.flavor: As the bell tolls with the sunrise, the crows feast.

effect:
CARDNAME has **stealth** as long as it's awake.

[Level 1+] CARDNAME may retaliate against attackers while not defending.
effect_raw:
Lurking Assailant has stealth as long as it's awake.

[Level 1+] Lurking Assailant may retaliate against attackers while not defending.
flavor: Some assassins prove their skill with a dagger, others prove it with a glib tongue and twisted schemes.
name: Lurking Assailant

rule.description: Lurking Assailant's [Level 1+] ability allows it to retaliate against attackers even if that attacker isn't attacking Lurking Assailant. For example, if the opponent is attacking your champion with an ally, Lurking Assailant can retaliate. During that damage step, your champion will take damage from the attacking ally, and Lurking Assailant will deal damage to that attacking ally.

effect_html: Lurking Assailant has stealth as long as it's awake.Level 1+ Lurking Assailant may retaliate against attackers while not defending.

editions.effect:
[Level 2+] You may activate this card without paying its reserve cost. If you do, skip your next draw phase.

If target unit would be dealt %attack%combat% damage this turn, prevent 3 of that damage.

[Level 2+] You may activate this card without paying its reserve cost. If you do, skip your next draw phase.

If target unit would be dealt combat damage this turn, prevent 3 of that damage.

effect:
[Level 2+] You may activate this card without paying its reserve cost. If you do, skip your next draw phase.

If target unit would be dealt combat damage this turn, prevent 3 of that damage.

If target unit would be dealt combat damage this turn, prevent 3 of that damage.

rule.description: If multiple effects have a player skip the same phase, that player must skip that phase multiple times. For example, if two Resolute Stands were activated by a player without paying its reserve cost due to its ability, that player skips their next two draw phases.

effect_html: Level 2+ You may activate this card without paying its reserve cost. If you do, skip your next draw phase.If target unit would be dealt combat damage this turn, prevent 3 of that damage.

rule.description: Varuckan Acolyte's On Enter ability does not specifically target a regalia that you don't control. This means that if you control the only regalia with memory cost 0, that regalia must be the target for this ability.

effect_html: On Enter: Destroy target regalia with memory cost 0. Level 3+ Varuckan Acolyte gets +3.
